sub_title: Geological/Subsurface Data Analyst at Shell Oil
summary:
With degrees in both Petroleum Geology and Energy/Resource Management, I have professional experience including but not limited to providing onsite geological and engineering support and services to drilling operations on and offshore across Europe and the Middle East, for numerous operators and in varied down-hole conditions..

Currently in a long-term office-based role in an exploration department managing all subsurface data and applications for an operating unit in Shell at its global headquarters in the Hague.

Outside of work I live in glorious Amsterdam for a number of years now and in my freetime my passions are travelling, live music and the great outdoors.
